website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight leave-in conditioner with unbeatable detangling power.
pros: Works on fine hair without weighing it down
cons: A few say it left their hair crunchy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING product
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the word "amazing" easily but this hair product is just that. I have struggled my whole life with very coarse, wavy hair. Anti-frizz products are too greasy, detanglers are not enough. I have tried dozens of products over the years, various price points, none really do what I need until now. This spray makes my hair soft for the first time ever, and minimizes tangles too. After washing/conditioning, I put a few sprays in before brushing with a wet brush, then a few more once I'm done brushing. It's just fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Aimster

customer_reviews.title: Compared to Keratin Mist
customer_reviews.text: If you look inside the bottle, Keratin Leave-in Conditioner is a thick white conditioner and Keratin Mist is a gold color liquid. Both make it super easy to comb through. The Leave-in Conditioner helps weigh down the hair if you are looking for more initial control over frizzies. I’m not sure why this bottle is half the size of the Keratin Mist for around the same price, though.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coral

customer_reviews.title: Meh... disappointing...but
customer_reviews.text: Update:. It still doesn't do much to soften or condition my hair but I noticed that I have less fall out since I decided to use it instead of toss it in the trash. I guess that something 😁 This hasn't done anything spectacular for my hair at all. I don't notice any difference. I read the reviews before ordering .and was hopeful...but the only thing good is it sprays evenly for a conditioner.... The smell is ok. It's a light citrus-type fragrance. Doesn't make you smell like pledge furniture polish at all...more like a real lemon scent.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: It's a great conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner is the best I've tried. And I've tried many. 1 week and I noticed my hair is stronger and more lustrous. It makes managing natural hair very easy. No shedding!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great product for hair
customer_reviews.text: Great product for hair. I love it. Just spray it in after shampooing, conditioning, towel drying and go! No rinsing required. It has a pleasant smell and has made a big difference in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this leave in conditioner! Initially used at an upscale salon on vacation and loved it. Makes a noticeable difference on my hair, which has become dry and damaged over the years of color treating. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Robyn D

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed on a little more than I should have the first time, but it gave me waves that I haven't seen in my hair directly after washing, ever (next time I'll only spritz 3-4 pumps). That was a great surprise. As recommended by another buyer, avoid your scalp area. I was not that impressed with the fragrance but fortunately it goes away after awhile. Wish they could improve on that aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: nice leave in conditioner
customer_reviews.text: very nice leave in conditioner. I was having some damage from coloring and this really is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Country Hick

customer_reviews.title: COMPARE TO 'IT'S A 10'
customer_reviews.text: SIMILAR TO 'IT A TEN' LEAVE-IN WHICH I WAS ALWAYS SUPER LOYAL TO, BUT THE PRICE KEPT ON INCREASING. TRIED OUT THIS LITTLE GEM AND 'IT'S A WINNER' LOL. VERY SIMILAR EFFECT, FEEL AND MOISTURE, MUCH SMALLER PRICE TAG.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this leave-in conditioner for daily use. It is stated that it will straighten the hair during the day. I did not find this at all. It make my hair more curly and looked more dry. I do not recommend it for dry hair; however, it may work better if used with other CHI shampoo and conditioner. You have to try if it will work with your hair !
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: The frangrance is way too strong!
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies and one of them is perfume. Can actually close up my throat. I opened the product and smelling, I am afraid to put on my hair due to the intense smell. It might be nice to some but can become poison to me. DO YOU MAKE THIS PRODUCT IN A SOFTER ODOR OR FRAGRANCE FREE? Someone recommended this to me but not knowing the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Ortagus

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand for many years, periodically. Before you buy in the «blind» I advise you first get acquainted with this product closer to the mall. This spray has a very pleasant smell and works great. I will say about the other products of this brand - you need to be careful, because I met the mask of this product with a disgusting smell.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Saves my hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair gets split ends but now my hair is so much healthier. Every night I dampen the ends of my hair and apply some leave-in conditioner and braid it and it looks great in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: John Iseli

customer_reviews.title: Chi leave in conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended to try this out by a beautician. She informed me it would help strengthen my hair. The smell is nice but I habe yet to see any improvement on my hair. I use quite a bitnin my hair because when I use the normal amount it doesn't feel like enough. Not really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Spencer-Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Chi karetin leave in conditioner
customer_reviews.text: My hair is so dry prior to using cHI Karetin leave in conditioner. It stops the freezes, hair feels smooth. When I wash my hair I don’t use that thick conditioner any more. I just towel dry, spray, massage in, comb through (and I have thick wavy hair) and let it dry naturally
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Fake fake fake
customer_reviews.text: This is not real chi. The bottle is completely different. Different text and product does not work the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: I definitely love the way the product smells. I feel it works best in wet to damp hair, then towel dry. Makes hair soft. I live in the desert so my hair is extra dry. I just started using it so will see what the outcome is. So far seems pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh relief for my fried bleached hair
customer_reviews.text: 1st time I’ve ever bought this item. Have been bleaching my pixie haircut for years! Finally I’ve found ‘the one’ product that’s a cure for the crispy fried blonde feel post-bleach job. Smells amazing. I’m buying more soon 👍
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely worth every penny. I love it so much that I use it on my children and husband as well! Just a few sprays after towel drying, then brush it in! It smells delicious, and leaves your hair very soft. This is the first leave in conditioner I've ever used that made my hair noticeably softer. Will definitely keep buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: To control my frizzy hair.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leave in conditioner I have ever used. I have very frizzy and natural curly hair. This product controls frizz and gives me soft curls. Plus I love the fragrance. I always get compliments on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: So amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so amazing and smells just as good. It really conditions your hair good. My daughter and I bleached our hair and this made it feel so healthy afterwards, it was like we didn't even color it.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so amazing. I use it on my Maltipoo. Everyone compliments him on how soft he is, and how good he smells. He never smells that good when I pay $80 to have him groomed.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Works on my fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: Since recently bleaching and damaging my hair, this product has made my hair softer and repaired it enough that my hair is not like straw. I spray it all after ashower and sleep with it in my hair. The next day it's soft and brushable.
customer_reviews.author: Kikachu

customer_reviews.title: Can you smell that smell?
customer_reviews.text: The scent for me was just way too strong. In all honesty I’ve used alot of Kreatin based leave in conditioners so it does work ok in that regard. The scent however I feel is too strong for a leave-in conditioner. Literally smells like straight chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Just JP!

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: CHI is the best on market for treated hair. This owns up to the CHI brand. Is great highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Soph

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved this product! A little goes a long way and it smells amazing but not overpowering. I’ve used it for years and it’s cruelty free. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Jules1943

customer_reviews.title: Great filler
customer_reviews.text: I like this pore refiner. Just smooth it in, tamp in a little powder and you are now poreless. The color is great, glides on smooth and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. This is the first time I have used a Keratin leave in conditioner. It leaves my hair soft and shiny. And it smells nice also.
customer_reviews.author: R D

customer_reviews.title: A little thick and heavy for a spray
customer_reviews.text: I find wetting one palm, and one spray on the wet hand and rubbing hands together before applying to hair and scalp works well. I usually towel off after that and then brush my hair. I have thinning, fine hair and can use this routine to go from "bed-head" messy hair to recently showered and groomed appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Marc G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product! Smells great, and makes my hair feel amazing. I have thick black hair that sheds alot depending on the seasons and within 3 uses my hair has almost completely stopped shedding, much to my amazement. Doesnt feel heavy or greasy
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: No no no
customer_reviews.text: This product made my naturally kind of soft hair veryyy very dry and I had to wash my hair that same night because of how dry it made my hair.. if you have soft fair hair, it might not be for you..
customer_reviews.author: Christeen Fahim

customer_reviews.title: Great for natural hair!!
customer_reviews.text: Let start off by saying I love the smell. It worked wonders for my hair. Hair was easy to manage and very easy go style...
customer_reviews.author: Mia Scott

customer_reviews.title: This leave in is amazing, really makes my hair easy to comb through ...
customer_reviews.text: This leave in is amazing, really makes my hair easy to comb through and has helped smooth the damage I've done to it through bleaching and such.
customer_reviews.author: K. Love

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is fine and has been highlighted, colored, highlighted again. It was dry and when shampoo and conditioned it was in knots. When I would dry it, it was a frizzy mess. This leave in spray is amazing. After two days of use my hair is not frizzy and smoother then before. I couldn’t of asked for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: soft hair
customer_reviews.text: wife loves it uses it all the time great product amazon has great customer service and good shipping time
customer_reviews.author: Charpet

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It holds your frizzy nappy Velcro without looking like a clown
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love! The smell is great and works well in my hair. Soft and helps untangle my curly/wavy hair.
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: Smooth like butter
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Makes my daughters thick, curly, tangled hair easy to brush & only a few sprays needed so it lasts a while, even though she has hair past the middle of her back. I use it for my thin hair too, but avoid my scalp because my hair tends to be oily & adding this means a limp mess by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not overly impressed. I expected a better scent and more softness but it was ok.
customer_reviews.author: jackie821rrt

customer_reviews.title: Get this
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice addition to my hair car routine. Put in day after straightening my hair and it made my hair have nice beachy waves and it looked so healthy
customer_reviews.author: Francesca L

customer_reviews.title: Very floral/smelly.. didn't help frizzyness
customer_reviews.text: To me this was smelly and made my hair frizzy.. everyone is different tho..
customer_reviews.author: holly hone

customer_reviews.title: P.U.!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a beautician so I can't say whether this is good for your hair or not. I can tell you it smelled so bad I had to re-wash my hair! I thought Chi was a reputable brand?

customer_reviews.title: no more tangles
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and really helps to detangle and soften my hair. I use just a few sprays to my hair after every wash.
customer_reviews.author: Dora H.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ulta is always out of this product but Amazon always saves the day! Arrives quickly , great product . I use it everyday and it smells amazing!!!

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome. Don't look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to find something else a little cheaper.... I ended up purchasing Chi again. Nothing else tames my fly aways as well!

customer_reviews.title: In LUV!!
customer_reviews.text: The scent of this is amazing & made my hair look beautiful without adding anything else .. Will definitely buy again & again

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A great scent, a great product. I like it better than It's a A Ten for my hair.

customer_reviews.title: Leave In Goop
customer_reviews.text: Liked the smell of this product, but it left my hair feeling like I needed to rinse it out. The return process was great.

customer_reviews.title: Leave In Goop
customer_reviews.text: Like the smell of the product, but didn't like the way it made my hair feel. Felt gummy like I needed to rinse it out.

customer_reviews.title: Works great to soften my bleached hair
customer_reviews.text: Loving this! Works great to soften my bleached hair. And it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Seaton

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t read fully; alcohol inside
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give a fair review of product, I didn’t read all of the ingredients, there is isopropyl alcohol in which is known for causing hair breakage, so I don’t think I will use. Have read other good reviews, my mistake for not thoroughly reading ingredient list. Fast shipping on product also

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for years. Great after shampoo detangler. Softens my hair beautifully.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It smells very good and it makes your hair very soft

customer_reviews.title: Love this product but more expensive than just buying it in the store
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for my daughter but it was more expensive buying it online here than in the store

customer_reviews.title: Review

customer_reviews.title: Get it!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great for tangle prone curls!
customer_reviews.text: All hair types are different but my boyfriend has curls that are messy tangles when he doesn't use any products in his hair. When he uses this after a morning shower his hair stays curled all day and doesn't turn into a mess, even with rain.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!

customer_reviews.title: Great smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and the way it makes my hair feel so soft! I travel often so it's the perfect size for a carry on bag. CHI products are my go-to.

customer_reviews.title: If your hair responds well to keratin then I highly recommend this leave in

customer_reviews.title: Worst leave in ever

product_meta.title: CHI Keratin Leave-in Conditioner ,6 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Size:6 OunceCHI Keratin Leave-In Conditioner is a unique reconstructing leave in treatment designed to infuse damaged hair with a powerful dose of natural keratin to rebuild hair's cuticle. Combining the natural reconstructing power of keratin with the essential nourishments of jojoba and argon oils, this highly sophisticated compound dramatically improves elasticity and prevents future breakage, while adding intense hydration that restores softness and shine.

BRAND STORY
CHI haircare and tools are manufactured by Farouk Systems a Houston based company.
feature_bullets: Designed to infuse damaged hair with a powerful dose of natural keratin to rebuild hair's cuticle
It improves hair elasticity and preventing future breakage

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
